title: Hot drink keep them hot!
body:
I use everyday!
Keep hot drink hot!! For long hours if you close the lid.
Easy to wash them.

title: Good purchase
body: Very good water bottle; keeps cold and is durable.

title: Hate it, worse I had
body: One year after the purchase for my son, I hate this bottle with passion! It’s not leak proof and after several months, it got so hard to drink from, like the water is not coming out! What a waste of money

title: Lovely color
body: Great bottle - wife loves it.

title: Worst product
body: Hey guys, if you’d like to send your kid to school with a soaking wet backpack, these are definitely the bottles for you! They leak, no matter what you do. Don’t waste your money on these.

title: Good, but not as durable
body: My daughter loved the design and color but the lid broke in a couple of months

title: Excellent
body:
Excellent Water Bottle – Highly Recommend
I’m very happy with this water bottle. It keeps my drinks cold for hours, doesn’t leak, and feels sturdy and well-made. The design is sleek, and the wide opening makes it easy to clean. Definitely a great purchase!

title: Good size but leaky
body: I've had this a few months. It's pretty good, but it does tend to leak and drip from the spout.

title: Perfect
body: Simple to clean, easy to carry, fits nicely in cup holders.

title: Good seller
body: Product as described with timely delivery
